item.title: This show was about the weather and porn
item.description: We did a show. And it was like, awesome. Sssheesh. Gawd.

item.title: Can we get ice cream?
item.description: Lets get ice cream. You are buying right? Then you can go home, without me. Dingleberries.

item.title: Sarah grabbed my butt
item.description: Like, Sarah grabbed my butt. I know! What a tramp. I love her. Smell my feet.
